ground_truth_reviews.comment: The `get_post_by_id` function is missing a docstring. Public methods should be documented to explain their purpose, arguments, return values, and any exceptions they might raise. This makes the code easier to use and maintain. Please add a docstring explaining that it retrieves a post by ID and raises `PostNotFoundException` if the post doesn't exist.

title: feat: Add post retrieval service methods
body: This commit introduces methods to fetch posts from the in-memory store. It adds `get_post_by_id` to retrieve a single post and `get_all_posts` to retrieve the complete list.
